trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: Attack rolls against the displacer beast have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}, since it projects an illusion that makes it appear to be near its actual location. This trait is suppressed while the displacer beast has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The displacer beast makes one Rend attack and one Tentacle attack.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 feet. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Slashing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
